Directions: In a skillet, cook beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Transfer to a slow cooker. stir in the tomato sauce, tomatoes and seasonings. Cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours or until bubbly.
Increase heat to high; stir in pasta, spinach and cheeses. Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.
Ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, cut up
1 (16 ounce) package bow tie pasta, cooked and drained
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
